Member Function Documentation

Widget* gaia::core::WidgetReplacer::inflate ( )

Inflates the layout resource identified by getLayoutResource() and replaces this StubbedWidget in its parent by the inflated layout resource.

Returns:
The inflated layout resource.
void gaia::core::WidgetReplacer::setLayoutResource ( int32_t  layoutResource)

Specifies the layout resource to inflate when this StubbedWidget becomes visible or invisible or when inflate() is invoked.

The Widget created by inflating the layout resource is used to replace this StubbedWidget in its parent.

Parameters:
layoutResourceA valid layout resource identifier (different from 0.)
